text: 8:32 Godɨn Araziba 25:1O Ikiavɨra Itir God, nɨ uan nguibamɨn ikɨ, uan ingangarir gumazamizibar akaba baragh, deraghvɨra men kotiam akɨrigh. Egh nɨ mɨzazim isɨ gumazir osɨmtɨzim gamizim gasɨ, egh osɨmtɨzir kuramɨn uam a ikaragh. Egh nɨ deraghvɨra osɨmtɨziba puvatɨzir gumazim damightɨ, gumazamiziba bizir kamɨn ganigh fogh suam an arazir kuram gamizir puvatɨ.
